SEARCH
Package com.sentifraud.libraries.common.kafka

Class EventConsumer

java.lang.Object
com.sentifraud.libraries.common.kafka.EventConsumer
public class EventConsumer extends Object
A reusable Kafka consumer for consuming GenericEvent objects from a Kafka topic.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    EventConsumer(Properties kafkaProperties)
    Initializes the Kafka consumer with the provided properties.

  • Constructor Details

    • EventConsumer

      public EventConsumer(Properties kafkaProperties)
      Initializes the Kafka consumer with the provided properties.
      Parameters:
      kafkaProperties - Kafka configuration properties.
      Throws:
      KafkaConfigurationException - if required properties are missing.

  • Method Details

    • subscribe

      public void subscribe(String topic)
      Subscribes to the specified Kafka topic.
      Parameters:
      topic - The Kafka topic to subscribe to.

    • pollEvents

      public void pollEvents(Duration timeout, EventHandler eventHandler)
      Polls for events from the subscribed topic and passes them to the provided EventHandler.
      Parameters:
      timeout - The duration to wait for events.
      eventHandler - The handler to process the events.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the Kafka consumer.
